On Thu, 22 May 2003, doomlordx wrote:

> The furthest that got was Lord Jakarta's Gates (Hard!). I hope
> OpenGlad-E completes that plot, perhaps with a final battle against
> Jakarta himself...

If I remember correctly (and I should, cause I took a single thief through
every scenario two weeks ago), you actually kill Jakarta in that level.
He's the cleric wandering around the room that looks like a smiley face on
the map. But yeah, the battle was hardly epic. I'm thinking that if/when
trigger support is implemented, there should be a trigger to automatically
end the level and move the team to a new level, so that when you kill
Jakarta's guards or something, you can go straight on to fighting against
him, and there can be a nice narrative along with it.

- Yan
